00028 #include "translation/HaplotypeExperimentReport.h"
00029 //
00030 #include "util/Guid.h"
00031 
00032 void HaplotypeExperimentReport::open(const std::string& fileName)
00033 {
00034   // our init
00035   m_guid=affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00036   // describe our columns.
00037   m_tsv.defineFile("experiment"    "\t"
00038                    "geneId"        "\t"
00039                    "sample"        "\t"
00040                    "call"          "\t"
00041                    "callCount"     "\t"
00042                    "knownCount"    "\t"
00043                    "UNKExists"     "\t"
00044                    "basecallRate"  "\t"
00045                    "basecallCount" "\t"
00046                    "noCallCount"   "\t"
00047                    "possibleRareAlleleCount" "\t"
00048                    "notAvailableCount");
00049   //
00050   m_tsv.addHeader("dmet3-file-type","haplotype-experiment-report");
00051   m_tsv.addHeader("dmet3-report-guid",m_guid);
00052   //
00053   m_tsv.writeTsv_v1(fileName);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void HaplotypeExperimentReport::close()
00057 {
00058   m_tsv.close();
00059 }
00060 
00061
